items.title: Microsoft Unveils 50% Xbox Game Pass Ultimate Price Hike, New Tiers
items.description: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate now costs 50% more which Microsoft is trying to justify with new games and features added.

items.title: Gaming Worlds Could Be The Answer To AI’s Data Problem
items.description: Stanford PhDs Fan-Yun Sun and Sharon Lee cofounded AI research company Moonlake AI to help people "vibe code virtual worlds."
